odd.p: Accompanying CD-ROM contains files in various formats to be used in training medical personnel to deal with terminal care in a collaborative manner with the patient and the patient's family.

archdesc.scopecontent: Documentary deals with end-of-life care by health professionals. Video contains interviews with persons involved in the case of Evan Mayday who broke his neck in a swimming accident. Medical personnel involved in his care, the hospital chaplain, and Evan's wife Cheryl discuss his care and their own experiences dealing with his eventual decision to remove medical care and accept a "good" death.
